learningContent.title: Referencing map files in map files

lcInstruction.p: You can reference map files inside map files. For example, if you have a standard introductory section, you could create a map collecting those topics and reference that map inside every map for a deliverable (a PDF file, for example).
You can also create a map for every main section and reference those map files in a deliverable-level map file.
